animatorMap.COMMENT: Animation Graph for the Word Copy Tutor

word_copy.title: Word copying tutor
word_copy.COMMENT: This tutor is designed for copying words.

INPUT_HESITATION_FEEDBACK.COMMENT: prompt when user hesitates when they should be writing.

tracks.name: Tap Prompt
tracks.soundsource: Please tap here to hear the word again.mp3

tracks.name: PLAY - Write the missing letter in
Evaluate sentence on hesitation (word level feedback)
Evaluate sentence on hesitation (sentence level feedback)
release the audio features for the first edit

tracks.name: deactivate edit mode for the word
update the response colors for each letter in word

ITEM_COMPLETE_BEHAVIOR.COMMENT: The data item - letter/word/sentence is finished

DEMO_COMPLETE_BEHAVIOR.COMMENT: The demo data item - letter/word/sentence is finished

GENERAL_ERROR_BEHAVIOR.COMMENT: Do this when they make a mistake

MERCY_RULE_BEHAVIOR.COMMENT: Do this when they've made too many mistakes

tracks.name: DO BETTER NEXT TIME - Feedback
tracks.soundsource: Next time you can do better.mp3

CHAR_ERROR_BEHAVIOR.COMMENT: wrong character was selected by recognizer

START_HESITATION_ON_STOP_WRITING.COMMENT: Does two things- 1) posts a delayed hesitation feedback call(postNamed) 2) sets a volatile behavior for START_WRITING to cancel and reset hesitation number

NEXTITEM.COMMENT: This node presents a word for user to copy.

CORRECT.COMMENT: When user inputs a correct answer...

WRONG.COMMENT: When user inputs an incorrect answer...

UNRECOGNIZED.COMMENT: When the recognizer fails to identify the input...

NEXTSCENE.COMMENT: When module is complete - move to next scene in the scenegraph
